description: Retention of one 2-storey shed and one single storey shed erected at rear of site for storage of equipment related to workshop.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION :  The development hereby approved shall be maintained in accordance with the following approved plans:

Map Showing the Location of application P110578; Ordnance Survey Site Plan 12 Mallow Street London EC1Y 8RQ; 12 Mallow Street, Basement level - Shed #1 Drawing; 12 Mallow Street, Basement level - Shed #2 Drawing; 12 Mallow Street, Basement level - Scale 1:50 Block Plan showing location of Shed #1 and Shed #2; 11-12 Mallow Street, EC1Y 8RQ - Scale 1:100 Block Plan showing location of Shed #1 and Shed #2.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
